definition[0]: the unpleasant parts of a place or society that are normally hidden
example[0]: photographs that capture the underbelly of the United States – its poverty, its injustice, and its alienated underclass
definition[1]: the weakest part of an organization or a person’s character, that is most easily attacked or criticized
example[1]: They needed to find the soft underbelly of their opponents.
definition[2]: the lower part of an animal’s body, including the stomach
